p.k: Drama Canada (2017). Hrají: Morgan Taylor Campbell, Jared Abrahamson, Jedidiah Goodacre. Režie: Cody Brown.
p.d: Shot in his hometown of Fort McMurray before it was ravaged by wildfires, Cody Bown's drama draws on real-life events to capture snapshots of a community teetering on a precipice and a collection of twenty somethings whose seemingly directionless lives have intersected.
